Class OPLElection

  • java.lang.Object
    • OPLElection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Election

    public class OPLElection
extends java.lang.Object
implements Election

    OPLElection

    Purpose

    The OPLElection class provides methods to obtain the results of an OPL election specified by some BallotFile.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OPLElection(BallotFile bf)
      Initializes an OPLElection with the proper OPL election parameters specified in bf.

    • Method Summary

      • OPLElection

        public OPLElection(BallotFile bf)
        Initializes an OPLElection with the proper OPL election parameters specified in bf.
        Parameters:
        bf - A BallotFile object representing the ballot file to be considered.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumCandidates

        public int getNumCandidates()
        Method to obtain the number of candidates present in an OPLElection instance.
        Returns:
        An int denoting the number of candidates in the election.

      • getNumSeats

        public int getNumSeats()
        Method to obtain the number of seats available in an OPLElection instance.
        Returns:
        An int denoting the number of seats available in the election.

      • getNumBallots

        public int getNumBallots()
        Method to obtain the number of ballots cast in an OPLElection instance.
        Returns:
        An int denoting the number of ballots cast in the election.

      • getQuota

        public int getQuota()
        Method to obtain the quota for an OPLElection instance. The quota denotes the number of ballots any party must obtain in order to receive 1 additional seat.
        Returns:
        An int denoting the quota for the election.

      • getCandidates

        public Candidate[] getCandidates()
        Method to obtain all candidates present in an OPLElection instance.
        Returns:
        A Candidate[] containing all Candidate objects present in the election.

      • getParties

        public Party[] getParties()
        Method to obtain all parties present in an OPLElection instance.
        Returns:
        A Party[] containing all Party objects present in the election.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Method to obtain the results of an OPLElection instance.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A String containing a short description of the election parameters as well as winners.

      • runElection

        public void runElection()
        Method to run the primary algorithm of OPL elections. The OPLElection class is designed such that the algorithm is executed only once per instance of OPLElection.
        Specified by:
        runElection in interface Election

      • getCandidateWinners

        public java.util.Set<Candidate> getCandidateWinners()
        Method to obtain the winning candidates of an OPLElection instance. A candidate is determined to be a winner if it has won a seat in the election.
        Specified by:
        getCandidateWinners in interface Election
        Returns:
        A Set containing all Candidate objects that have been determined to be winners.

      • getPartyWinners

        public java.util.Set<Party> getPartyWinners()
        Method to obtain the winning parties of an OPLElection instance. A party is determined to be a winner if it has won at least 1 seat in the election.
        Specified by:
        getPartyWinners in interface Election
        Returns:
        A Set containing all Party objects that have been determined to be winners.
